member.name: T:Rlaan.Toolkit.Enums.AuthorAttribute
member.summary: An internal class which provides an author attribute for both structs, interfaces, enums and methods.

member.name: T:Rlaan.Toolkit.Enums.CultureType
member.summary: Enum which contains all the cultures while representing both the short as the string value.

member.name: F:Rlaan.Toolkit.Enums.CultureType.Dutch
member.summary: Represents the Culture Code "0x0413"; the description contains the Language Culture Name "nl-NL".

member.name: F:Rlaan.Toolkit.Enums.CultureType.Canada
member.summary: Represents the Culture Code "0x1009"; the description contains the Language Culture Name "en-CA".

member.name: F:Rlaan.Toolkit.Enums.CultureType.UnitedKingdom
member.summary: Represents the Culture Code "0x0809"; the description contains the Language Culture Name "en-GB".

member.name: F:Rlaan.Toolkit.Enums.CultureType.UnitedStates
member.summary: Represents the Culture Code "0x0409"; the description contains the Language Culture Name "en-US".

summary.para: Enum which contains several currencies, requires the "Description" extension method from "Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions" if you want to show the valuta sign.

member.name: F:Rlaan.Toolkit.Enums.CurrencySignType.None
member.summary: Represents an empty string, in case you don't want to show a currency sign.

member.name: T:Rlaan.Toolkit.Enums.EnvironmentType
